title: US Deepening Its Relationship With India In Several Areas: Official
content: The United States is deepening its relationship with India in several key areas, a senior administration official said Monday.
summary: The United States is deepening its relationship with India in several key areas, a senior administration official said Monday.

title: Indian-American Man's Rs 8,300 Crore Fraud Scheme Shakes Top US Investors
content: An Indian-American businessman Rishi Shah, the former billionaire cofounder of Outcome Health, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison by a US court.
summary: An Indian-American businessman Rishi Shah, the former billionaire cofounder of Outcome Health, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison by a US court.

title: Joe Biden's Son Hunter Sues Fox News For Airing "Revenge Porn"
content: US President Joe Biden's son Hunter is suing right-wing Fox News for airing nude images of him in a miniseries that he claims amount to "revenge porn," court documents showed Monday.
summary: US President Joe Biden's son Hunter is suing right-wing Fox News for airing nude images of him in a miniseries that he claims amount to "revenge porn," court documents showed Monday.

title: "Serious Mistake": Netanyahu After Israel Frees Head Of Gaza Hospital
content: Israel on Monday freed the head of Gaza's biggest hospital who said he was tortured during seven months in detention, but Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu soon after criticised the release as a "serious mistake".
summary: Israel on Monday freed the head of Gaza's biggest hospital who said he was tortured during seven months in detention, but Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu soon after criticised the release as a "serious mistake".

title: "When Will Politicians...": Elon Musk Slams Kamala Harris Over Trump "Lie"
content: Social media platform X owner Elon Musk on Monday slammed US Vice President Kamala Harris for "lying" about former president Donald Trump's stance on abortion ban.
summary: Social media platform X owner Elon Musk on Monday slammed US Vice President Kamala Harris for "lying" about former president Donald Trump's stance on abortion ban.

title: "We Hope Any Country On Planet Condemns...": US On India-Pak Ties
content: Principal Deputy Spokesperson for the US Department of State, Vedant Patel reiterated the country's stand on terrorism and said that they hope that any country on the planet condemns terrorism anywhere.
summary: Principal Deputy Spokesperson for the US Department of State, Vedant Patel reiterated the country's stand on terrorism and said that they hope that any country on the planet condemns terrorism anywhere.

title: "He'll Be More.... ": Biden On Supreme Court Immunity Ruling In Trump Case
content: President Joe Biden warned on Monday that the US Supreme Court's landmark ruling on presidential immunity sets a "dangerous precedent" that Donald Trump would exploit if elected in November.
summary: President Joe Biden warned on Monday that the US Supreme Court's landmark ruling on presidential immunity sets a "dangerous precedent" that Donald Trump would exploit if elected in November.

title: Russian Military Says It Captured 2 More Ukrainian Villages
content: Russia's Defence Ministry said on Monday that its forces had taken control of two villages in eastern Ukraine.
summary: Russia's Defence Ministry said on Monday that its forces had taken control of two villages in eastern Ukraine.

title: 1 Killed In Shooting In US' Seattle: Cops
content: A person died in a shooting in Seattle, the US state of Washington, according to police.
summary: A person died in a shooting in Seattle, the US state of Washington, according to police.

title: Indian American Physician, 51, Pleads Guilty To Healthcare Fraud
content: A 51-year-old Indian American physician from the Chicago area has pleaded guilty to a federal healthcare fraud by billing Medicaid and private insurers for nonexistent services.
summary: A 51-year-old Indian American physician from the Chicago area has pleaded guilty to a federal healthcare fraud by billing Medicaid and private insurers for nonexistent services.

title: 39 Killed, Over 360 Injured In Anti-Tax Protest In Kenya: Rights Watchdog
content: At least 39 people have lost their lives in recent anti-government protests in Kenya against the new tax hike, reported Al Jazeera, citing the national rights watchdog.
summary: At least 39 people have lost their lives in recent anti-government protests in Kenya against the new tax hike, reported Al Jazeera, citing the national rights watchdog.

title: North Korea Says It Tested New Tactical Ballistic Missile
content: North Korea said it successfully tested a new tactical ballistic missile on Monday capable of carrying a 4.5-ton super-large warhead, official state news agency KCNA reported on Tuesday.
summary: North Korea said it successfully tested a new tactical ballistic missile on Monday capable of carrying a 4.5-ton super-large warhead, official state news agency KCNA reported on Tuesday.

title: "Proud Of Going To Prison": Former Trump Aide Begins 4-Month Sentence
content: Steve Bannon, an outspoken right-wing figure in American politics and former senior advisor to Donald Trump, reported to prison Monday to begin a four-month sentence for contempt of Congress.
summary: Steve Bannon, an outspoken right-wing figure in American politics and former senior advisor to Donald Trump, reported to prison Monday to begin a four-month sentence for contempt of Congress.

title: Russia Shoots Down 5 Aerial Targets Over Crimea, Says Governor
content: Russia shot down five aerial targets over Crimea on Monday, the Russian-installed governor of the Crimean port of Sevastopol, Mikhail Razvozhayev, said on his Telegram channel.
summary: Russia shot down five aerial targets over Crimea on Monday, the Russian-installed governor of the Crimean port of Sevastopol, Mikhail Razvozhayev, said on his Telegram channel.

title: Australia Doubles Foreign Student Visa Fees: How It Affects Indians
content: Australia has more than doubled the cost of student visa fees for international students from $710 to $1,600, a move which will impact lakhs of Indians planning to study in this country.
summary: Australia has more than doubled the cost of student visa fees for international students from $710 to $1,600, a move which will impact lakhs of Indians planning to study in this country.

title: US Supreme Court Orders Review Of Ruling On Contentious Social Media Laws
content: The US Supreme Court on Monday ordered lower courts to review a pair of Republican-backed state laws that imposed restrictions on social media companies to moderate content, sidestepping a ruling on their constitutional validity.
summary: The US Supreme Court on Monday ordered lower courts to review a pair of Republican-backed state laws that imposed restrictions on social media companies to moderate content, sidestepping a ruling on their constitutional validity.

title: Iran, Syria, North Korea Sued For Providing Hamas Support In US Court
content: More than 100 victims and relatives of victims of the Oct. 7 attack by Hamas militants in Israel sued Iran, Syria and North Korea on Monday, accusing the countries of providing Hamas support and demanding at least $4 billion in damages.
summary: More than 100 victims and relatives of victims of the Oct. 7 attack by Hamas militants in Israel sued Iran, Syria and North Korea on Monday, accusing the countries of providing Hamas support and demanding at least $4 billion in damages.

title: Meta Charged For Breaching EU Tech Rules Over Pay Or Consent Model
content: Meta Platforms was charged by EU antitrust regulators on Monday for failing to comply with landmark tech rules as they took aim at the US company's newly introduced pay or consent advertising model.
summary: Meta Platforms was charged by EU antitrust regulators on Monday for failing to comply with landmark tech rules as they took aim at the US company's newly introduced pay or consent advertising model.

title: No Food, Medicine: Gaza Hospital Chief's Israel Detention Ordeal
content: The head of the Gaza Strip's biggest hospital said on Monday after being freed from more than seven months of detention that he had been "tortured" by Israel.
summary: The head of the Gaza Strip's biggest hospital said on Monday after being freed from more than seven months of detention that he had been "tortured" by Israel.

title: Nepalese Spiritual Leader 'Buddha Boy' For 10 Years Over Child Sex Abuse
content: A Nepali court on Monday sentenced a man whose followers believe him to be a reincarnation of Buddha to 10 years in prison for child sexual abuse.
summary: A Nepali court on Monday sentenced a man whose followers believe him to be a reincarnation of Buddha to 10 years in prison for child sexual abuse.
